Generate meteorological outputs

seq_climate.Rd

Downloads and formats meteorological data from Meteo-France and DRIAS. This includes download of the nearest climatological station fiche (PDF), ombrothermic summaries, precipitation statistics. Results are written to an Excel workbook based on the internal template CLIMAT_MF.xlsx.

Usage

seq_climate(dirname = ".", cache = NULL, verbose = TRUE, overwrite = FALSE)

Arguments

dirname

character Directory where the matrice file is located. Defaults to the current working directory.

cache

character; Storage directory. Defaults to the user cache directory (see tools::R_user_dir())

verbose

logical If TRUE, display messages.

overwrite

logical If TRUE, file is overwritten.

Value

A named list of file paths :

  • `"fiche.meteo"“: Path to the downloaded climatological station PDF

  • `"meteofrance"“: Path to the generated Excel workbook
